entry.title: Introducing Kunyora 0.1.0
entry.summary: We are excited to introduce Kunyora which would help manage restful api request made by our apps. Kunyora is a rest based client for Javascript applications built to solve the problem of speed on the long run. Kunyora would automatically be respo
